REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0245 reute u f BC-NORTH-KOREA-WELCOMES 03-19 0091

TEXT.TITLE: NORTH KOREA WELCOMES CONTACT WITH U.S. DIPLOMATS
TEXT.BODY: North Korea said it welcomed new contacts between Korean and U.S. Diplomats and would impose no restrictions on them, the New China News Agency reported from Pyongyang. A North Korean Foreign Ministry statement said it hoped diplomatic contact would help "promote sincere conversations with goodwill and broad-mindedness," the agency said. The United States on March 9 lifted its ban on its diplomats speaking with North Korean diplomats on neutral territory. REUTER
